text: Juan Gesualdi (born 30 June 1929) was an Argentine equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Juan Gesualdi
